info.name: barnard59-graph-store
info.description: SPARQL Graph Store Protocol support for Linked Data pipelines
info.author: Thomas Bergwinkl <bergi@axolotlfarm.org> (https://www.bergnet.org/people/bergi/card#me)

operations.label: Read RDF/JS Quads (Graph Store)
operations.comment: Reads RDF/JS Quads from the given named graph using the SPARQL Graph Store Protocol.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-graph-store/get.js#default>
].

operations.label: Append RDF/JS Quads (Graph Store)
operations.comment: Appends RDF/JS Quads to the given named graph using the SPARQL Graph Store Protocol.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-graph-store/post.js#default>
].

operations.label: Write RDF/JS Quads (Graph Store)
operations.comment: Writes RDF/JS Quads to the given named graph using the SPARQL Graph Store Protocol.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-graph-store/put.js#default>
].
